text:
London, UK - Digital Shadows - Java Developer - Full time

Digital Shadows is a London based start-up providing cyber monitoring services to our clients. We are looking for a Java Developer with experience in building high-performance, scalable commercial applications to become a key member of our team. The role will involve all aspects of product development and engineering and have scope to influence the product roadmap, technology choices, architecture and much more.

See http://bit.ly/1CoTl7r for more details.
